Address.label: Address
Address.value: 231 WEST MICHIGAN STREET,P.O. BOX 1331, MILWAUKEE, Wisconsin, 53201, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: WEC Energy Group's electric and gas utility businesses serve electric and gas customers in its Illinois, Michigan, Minnesota, and Wisconsin service territories. The company also owns a 60% stake in American Transmission Co. WEC's asset mix is approximately 47% electric generation and distribution, 36% gas distribution, 12% electric transmission, and 5% unregulated renewable generation.
